ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Race to 60 (OT)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... was clearly courting the #1 guild I am still new to EQ and Innoruuk as a whole so I have to ask...  What guilds are considered the biggest?  Because I play
ygData.messageBody:
> someone to remove himself from the guild last night, though, because he
was clearly courting the #1 guild

I am still new to EQ and Innoruuk as a whole so I have to ask... What
guilds are considered the biggest? Because I play during the servers
off-peak hours (Aussie time) I tend to see a lot of guilds with only one or
two members in them. But with about 500 players on at the time there's not
much to represent :)

I am not asking because I want to be part of a "big" guild but just
curious. I don't want to give anyone the wrong impression :) Besides my
little one is already questing to join the guild most suited for her - size
or not!

Regards,

Jacana - level 7 wood elf bard - If you ever see her around say hello :)
She's chat with you for hours.


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
